name: GhibliMovie
0:
”Alexa, ask Ghibli Movie to tell me a ghibli movie to watch”
”Alexa, ask Ghibli Movie to tell me a movie to watch”
”Alexa, ask Ghibli Movie for Ghibli Movie”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ghibli movie
des: If you ever are lost on a Ghibli movie to watch, here's the resource for you! I have listed out all the movies to watch and this app will randomly pick one from the list to suggest to you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
